alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:41PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern White Pine County through 530 PM PDT... At 439 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 16 miles northwest of Shoshone, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Great Basin National Park, Shoshone, Baker, Connors Pass, Majors Place and Sacramento Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
